page.title: 12Halling By-Pass
page.content: In Lower Halling a By-Pass is being built to make Halling much quieter.The main road is very busy because the traffic uses it as a link between the M20 and the M2.There are very few bridges over the River Medway and Halling is between the busy bridges at Rochester and those at Aylesford and Maidstone. There are bridges on the By-Pass,two road bridges and a footbridge.One road bridge is already open and the footbridge is nearly finished.Some men working on it were in a crane and they knocked down an electricity cable.They had to repair it. We went down to look when the workmen started digging the first part of the road.They knocked down part of the recreation ground.It looked bare.They also knocked down a few houses,a pub and a club.
